directory.name: Manila Philippines Temple
directory.alt: Behind palm tree a Large White Building with a 5 spires, know as a temple. On the top on the middle largest spire is angel Moroni blowing a trumpet.
directory.address: 13 Temple Drive corner Whiteplains Avenue, Greenmeadows Subdivision, UGONG NORTE, Quezon City, 1110 Metro Manila, Philippines
directory.phase: PHASE 3: ALL LIVING ORDINANCES AND LIMITED PROXY ORDINANCES. Based on First Presidency direction, this temple has resumed limited operations.
